main.title: The Cornball
main.author: Victor Stodell
main.description: The Cornball is an addictive card game where you by moving the cards should place them in order from 2 to King.

about.title: About The Cornball
about.info: The goal of The Cornball is to put all the cards in order from 2 to king with one color on each line. What color is put on each line does not matter.Twos can only be put in a gap on the far left on the board. Other cards can only be put in a gap to the right of the card in the same color that is right before in order. No card can be put in a gap after the king.
about.help: Drag a card to the right gap or double-click the card to automatically find the right place. Click on a gap and the right card for that gap will flash.
about.contact: Become a fan of The Cornball on Facebook! There you have the opportunity to make comments or get in touch with me. Thank you for playing The Cornball!

roundover.title: End of round %s
roundover.description: No more moves can be done, the cards are being reshuffled...

gameover.title: Game over!
gameover.description: You failed to complete The Cornball!

gamewin.title: Congratulations!
gamewin.description: You put all cards on the right place and finished The Cornball!
gamewin.highscore: You made it to the high score list! Enter your name to send your score.
gamewin.nohighscore: Unfortunately you did not set a high score this time.
gamewin.name: Enter your name
